name: Oblation (Ludum Dare 43)
description:
OBLATION

Made from a scratch within 48 hours during LD43 compo. Oblation is a relaxing light puzzle game with pixel graphics. You play as hunted priest and must sacrifice citizen in order to ascend into the heavens and escape your cruel fate.

Try to be as quick as possible to escape in time. Avoid sacrificing wrong citizen.

CONTROLS

  • A, D / Left arrow, Right arrow to select person
  • W / Up arrow to sacrifice
  • S / Down arrow to release 
  • F1 to restart
